Translation.Text: Set support pins by clickin on the model

Pins can be used to define relationship between upper- and lower jaw.
Set parameters below, then click on model to place pins.
Hold left mouse button, then click right to delete pin.
Add attachments, e.g. to glue in plastic articulators. First, select type of attachment from tbhe list below.
Click on upper- or lower jaw to position attachment.

Position attachment for:
Upper Jaw
Red color means that the attachment is too close or too far away from model.
Hold left mouse button, then click right to delete attachment.

Position attachment for:
Lower Jaw
Red color means that the attachment is too close or too far away from model.
Hold left mouse button, then click right to delete attachment.
A plate pin intersects the implant cavity, but this is prohibited. Please reconsider your selection of plate pins.
